subject: Doping (Sports)
Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Rabobank team, which includes the Giro d’Italia leader Denis Menchov, said it had been contacted by officials conducting a wide-ranging doping investigation.
snippet: The Rabobank team, which includes the Giro d’Italia leader Denis Menchov, said it had been contacted by officials conducting a wide-ranging doping investigation.
